title: Let Go
description: A jaded mother makes a last-ditch effort to keep her family together by taking them on a trip to their teenage daughter's pole dancing competition.

title: Family Pack
description: When an old card game comes to life, a family jumps back in time to a medieval village where they must unmask werewolves to secure their return home.

title: Pedro Paramo
description: Based on Juan Rulfo's landmark novel, a man searches for his father, Pedro Páramo, in a town doomed by violence and the fury of a frustrated love.

title: Do Patti
description: A puzzling investigation leads a no-nonsense cop down a dark path involving the vicious rivalry between twin sisters and the volatile man they both love.

title: The Buckingham Murders
description: When a teen boy’s murder rattles a quiet English town, a grieving detective uncovers the hidden hostilities beneath its idyllic surface.

title: Devra
description: A mighty sea warrior takes a violent stand against the criminal deeds of his village. Years later, his mild-mannered son walks a path of his own.

title: Umjolo The Gone Girl
description: A couple's seemingly perfect relationship falters when one of them learns about the other's infidelity — but who said that relationships were easy?

title: The Shadow Strays
description: Skilled in the art of killing, a young assassin defies her mentor to save a boy from a ruthless crime syndicate — and she'll destroy anyone in her path.
